headline: Exelon Appoints David DeWalt to Board of Directors
summary: CHICAGO, March 10, 2025--Exelon (Nasdaq: EXC) today announced the appointment of David DeWalt, founder and chief executive officer of cybersecurity and venture capital firm NightDragon, to its Board of Directors effective March 10, 2025.
